title: Error on launching the client.
body:
So.. I'm trying to launch my Lol-client which I downloaded on this Laptop in high hopes to get playing for a long time but after several re-installations  I grew bit frustrated.
The error message on launching phase gives me an error message either saying: RADS Error
Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access. 
And Something about Kernel different times I've re-installed the client. 
Literally following up every single thing that might have been blocking the access; First I brought my router next to the laptop so I can have straight ethernal-cable connection, not WLAN, then I made sure my firewall doesn't block it, after that I tried to drop my firewall entirely so it doesn't block anything.
Well, that didn't work either, obviously as I'm writing this. 
Sooo does anyone have any ideas how should I proceed with this?

I just wanna go play some PAX {{champion:4}}  :D

replies.body: These errors (especially the kernel message) suggests that your operating system or setting is blocking the patcher from scanning your game files.  Checking your router firewall settings was a good step, but there may be other settings that need to be reconfigured.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Opened my UAC-settings widely open and ran the client as admin and it's working! :)
Thanks alot buddy! :)
